name: part_004
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performing 'Mela!' on stage with dynamic lighting and fire effects.
MC segment where Kanata addresses the audience, discusses the live theme, and introduces the next song.
Amane Kanata performing 'Rettou Joutou' (Bring It On) with green lasers and fast-paced choreography.

subtitles.original: どちらが正しいのかなんて
subtitles.english: I don't think anyone knows...

subtitles.original: 誰にもわからないさ
subtitles.english: ...which side is truly right.

subtitles.original: ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la

subtitles.original: 僕らだけの世界
subtitles.english: A world belonging only to us.

subtitles.original: ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la

subtitles.original: ギブアンドテイクさ
subtitles.english: It's all give and take.

subtitles.original: ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la

subtitles.original: 補い合えた暁には
subtitles.english: When we finally complete each other,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を見たい
subtitles.english: I want us to dream the same dream.

subtitles.original: 君はかっこいいと
subtitles.english: You were so cool,

subtitles.original: 苦しめてひとりぼっちにさせたのは
subtitles.english: but I hurt you and left you all alone.

subtitles.original: 少し僕のせいなんだよな
subtitles.english: That was partly my fault, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: だけど見るべきはリアルだ
subtitles.english: But what we need to face is reality.

subtitles.original: 今こそ僕が助けるんだ
subtitles.english: Now is the time for me to save you.

subtitles.original: 抱えないで信じて
subtitles.english: Don't bear it alone, believe in me,

subtitles.original: 頼ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to rely on me!

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't now the time?

subtitles.original: メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Burning and flaring up,

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: the justice hidden even within me.

subtitles.original: どうしようもない衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: Driven by a helpless impulse,

subtitles.original: ほら気付けば手を握っている
subtitles.english: look, I'm holding your hand before I knew it.

subtitles.original: 放っておけない
subtitles.english: I can't leave you alone.

subtitles.original: そんなに荷物を背負い込んで
subtitles.english: Taking on so many burdens,

subtitles.original: どこへ行くの
subtitles.english: where are you going?

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっと
subtitles.english: Just a little bit,

subtitles.original: 僕にちょっと預けてみては？
subtitles.english: why not entrust a little bit to me?

subtitles.original: こんな僕も
subtitles.english: Even someone like me,

subtitles.original: 君のヒーローになりたいのさ
subtitles.english: I want to become your hero.

subtitles.original: ラララララ ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la, la la la la la

subtitles.original: ラララララララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la la la la la

subtitles.original: ラララララララララ ララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la la la la la, la la la la

subtitles.original: ラララララララララ ララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la la la la la, la la la la

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ ララララララララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la, la la la la la la la la

subtitles.original: ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la

subtitles.original: ララララララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la la la la

subtitles.original: ララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la

subtitles.original: ララララララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la la la la

subtitles.original: はーい！皆さん
subtitles.english: Yes! Everyone!

subtitles.original: とうとう始まってしまいました 天音かなた卒業ライブ！
subtitles.english: It has finally started: the Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE!

subtitles.original: ということでですね
subtitles.english: And with that being said,

subtitles.original: こちらハッシュタグが あの シャープ天音かなた卒業ライブで
subtitles.english: the hashtag here is, um, #AmaneKanataGraduationLIVE,

subtitles.original: ございますんで ぜひこちら よろしくお願いいたします
subtitles.english: so please, I ask for your support with that.

subtitles.original: 一曲目に歌った『Mela!』は
subtitles.english: The first song I sang, 'Mela!',

subtitles.original: 実は初配信で歌うか悩んでいた楽曲だったので
subtitles.english: was actually a song I debated singing in my debut stream,

subtitles.original: ここで歌えてすごくよかった
subtitles.english: so I'm really glad I could sing it here.

subtitles.original: ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 小さい頃からね ヒロインよりヒーローになりたいっていう
subtitles.english: Since I was little, I was the type who wanted to be a hero

subtitles.original: タイプだったので
subtitles.english: rather than a heroine,

subtitles.original: そういった楽曲をたくさん歌わせていただきました
subtitles.english: so I've been allowed to sing many songs like that.

subtitles.original: 次からは ありがとうねみんな
subtitles.english: From here on... thank you everyone,

subtitles.original: 拍手もありがとう
subtitles.english: thank you for the applause.

subtitles.original: 次からはロックで！
subtitles.english: From here on, it's Rock!

subtitles.original: 感情をぶつけるような歌に挑戦しますんで
subtitles.english: I'll challenge a song where I can slam my emotions...

subtitles.original: ちょっとマイクがね
subtitles.english: Wait, the mic is a bit...

subtitles.original: 挑戦しますんで
subtitles.english: I'll challenge it!

subtitles.original: 聴いてください 『劣等上等』
subtitles.english: Please listen: 'Rettou Joutou' (Bring It On).

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Grow up!
subtitles.english: Grow up!

subtitles.original: Give up!
subtitles.english: Give up!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 BRING IT ON
subtitles.english: Inferiority, fine by me, BRING IT ON!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等
subtitles.english: Inferiority, fine by me!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 BRING IT ON
subtitles.english: Inferiority, fine by me, BRING IT ON!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 不眠日本
subtitles.english: Inferiority, fine by me, sleepless Japan.

subtitles.original: 子供騙しのマセマティカ
subtitles.english: Child-deceiving mathematica,

subtitles.original: バレてんだってそんなのってプライドがない
subtitles.english: it's obvious, you have no pride like that.

subtitles.original: ご立派 警鐘 気取りで
subtitles.english: Acting like a splendid warning bell,

subtitles.original: 紙の刑罰ばっかでつまんない
subtitles.english: it's boring with just paper punishments.

subtitles.original: ほらもっと 間違って上等
subtitles.english: Come on, make more mistakes, it's fine!

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて
subtitles.english: Lay your hands on the boredom.

subtitles.original: ママ やっぱあたしは
subtitles.english: Mama, after all, I...

subtitles.original: こんなところじゃ終われない
subtitles.english: ...can't end in a place like this.

subtitles.original: ぬるくて気が触れそう
subtitles.english: It's so lukewarm I might go crazy.

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye to make-believe and acting.

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever...

subtitles.original: いらないよ
subtitles.english: I don't need it!

subtitles.original: だだだ あたし大人になる
subtitles.english: I'm going to become an adult,

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて
subtitles.english: tasting both the bitter and the sweet.

subtitles.original: 今 パパパ変わる時代
subtitles.english: Now, the times are changing,

subtitles.original: 悪いことばっかじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: it's not all bad things, right?

subtitles.original: 過去も罪も罰も
subtitles.english: The past, the sins, the punishments,

subtitles.original: すべて飲み込んで
subtitles.english: swallow them all,

subtitles.original: 愛で生き抜いてやりこうんだわ
subtitles.english: and survive with love!

subtitles.original: Yeah 挑発
subtitles.english: Yeah, provocation.

subtitles.original: あたしたちは No Doubt
subtitles.english: We are No Doubt.

subtitles.original: 緑のアイツにばっか構ってんね
subtitles.english: You're only paying attention to that green guy.

subtitles.original: さあ Burn up いつまた
subtitles.english: Come on, Burn up, when will we...

subtitles.original: もらえる合格
subtitles.english: ...get a passing grade again?

subtitles.original: 赤ペンいれてよ どこがダメなんですか
subtitles.english: Correct it with a red pen, what's wrong with it?
